title: Karthus has no voice
body: Had a couple of games with Karthus over the last 2 days and have noticed that Karthus{{champion:30}}  has no Voice over while in game any more

replies.body: [They attempted to fix that issue today.](http://imgur.com/43NMo82) Sadly, it didn't work out.
Unfortunately, the files didn't push properly. D: Should be fixed next patch!
So a champion is completely mute for an entire patch. Great. {{item:3070}}
Just when I started playing him T_T
